ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, would it be a huge hassle if you could give the ring of the dead steps again? And who to ask about it, I m anxious also to get this... Also, does anyone
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, would it be a huge hassle if you could give the ring of the dead steps again?
And who to ask about it, I'm anxious also to get this...
Also, does anyone know how I could recharge the Pestilence Scythe from Lord Grimrot
in south karana? it used to be called the opal scythe, but changed with last
patch.. I can only guess that he would recharge it, but I'm afraid to try... not
sure about how to recharge things at all. Strangely, this scythe can be used by
necromancers. Imagine a necro with 2 hand slash... yeah.

Envy
Tunare server

> From: "Xillith ofNeriak" <xillith@...>
> Subject: Re: Re: Tusk quest
>
> Hey, I have the ring of the dead.
>
> It needed the Thex Mallet after all. Do that and it's yours. THe quest is
> apparently satisfied by either method. But in my opinion, Thex Mallet is
> the simplest.
>
> Xillith
> Rallos Zek
>
> The ring is worth the wait !
>
